messages.message:
On master, when I try to run golden, I get SSL error:
```~/Documents/workspace/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps > LEGACY=true make run-golden-test IB_API_KEY=dtyMk1FJf008hCw3WmXuLBgOWSiP3W IB_TEST_ENV=local TEST_FILES=run-flows-tests.json
requests.exceptions.SSLError: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='localhost', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /api/v1/jobs/status?job_id=74c7bc5e-433a-44be-bb14-5ab1daca5359 (Caused by SSLError(SSLError("bad handshake: Error([('SSL routines', 'tls_process_server_certificate', 'certificate verify failed')])")))```
Any ideas how to fix this?
Posted question with full error at https://stackoverflow.com/c/instabase/q/25/16
ah we moved it to https:// only so LEGACY is no longer supported. @Karthik S, are you able to help figure out how to get https://localhost for goldens? That’d be awesomely helpful!

I don’t think you can quite do that yet? But maybe I was doing something wrong? server-nginx on localhost seems to convert POST requests to GET requests for me. jira: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/INFRA-577
ah that would explain it! We’d need that fixed then, thanks for the context!
any chance we could leave the legacy=true flag in to keep the goldens running, especially leading up to UAT?
Yes for sure @Heymian. I had mistakenly thought that LEGACY=true was removed from webapp, and that we could only use https://localhost. Will move the goldens back to :5000 so we must use LEGACY=true
ran it myself and works now with LEGACY=true added
merged! you can try it out
thanks @Karthik S. Looks like heymian nailed it with us needing to fix this: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/INFRA-577
Confirmed. SSL problem is gone now.
